name: 2D Platformer Collision
description:
Here is a small demonstration of my work on custom 2D collision within Unity along with what I have accomplished with my (hopefully) flexible player state machine, which also uses custom physics rather than Unity's built-in physics.

With the exception of the enemy sprites, all assets are from the Sunny Land package on the Unity asset store.

Controls:

Z: Jump

X: Run

Space: Spawn an enemy

Enter: Restart game

Escape: Exit game
